com.bluegosling.concurrent.locks

Interface HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HierarchicalLock.ExclusiveLock, HierarchicalLock.SharedLock
    Enclosing class:
    HierarchicalLock

    public static interface HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock
    The result of acquiring a HierarchicalLock. After acquisition, this object can be used to release, demote, or promote the held lock. This API just contains methods in common to both types of acquired locks. Both concrete acquired locks provide a wider API, with method that are specific to them.
    See Also:
    HierarchicalLock.ExclusiveLock, HierarchicalLock.SharedLock

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock demoteToChild(HierarchicalLock child)
      Demotes this lock to a lock of the same type (exclusive or shared) on one of its children.
      HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock promoteToParent()
      Promotes this lock to a lock of the same type (exclusive or shared) on its parent.
      void unlock()
      Releases the held lock.

    • Method Detail

      • unlock

        void unlock()
        Releases the held lock.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this thread does not hold this lock or has already released it

      • demoteToChild

        HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock demoteToChild(HierarchicalLock child)
        Demotes this lock to a lock of the same type (exclusive or shared) on one of its children. On success, the held lock is released and replaced with a new HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock that represents the lock on the child. This method will block until the child lock becomes available, if necessary.
        Parameters:
        child - the child of this lock to which this lock is demoted
        Returns:
        the newly acquired lock on the given child
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this thread does not hold this lock or has already released it; if the given lock is not actually a child of the HierarchicalLock which produced this HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock; or if the lock could not be demoted because this thread holds the lock more than once (from re-entrance)
        DeadlockException - if waiting for the child lock would result in a deadlock (e.g. this thread holds a lock for which another thread is waiting, and that thread, or some other thread that directly or indirectly is waiting on it, is holding the child lock)

      • promoteToParent

        HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock promoteToParent()
        Promotes this lock to a lock of the same type (exclusive or shared) on its parent. On success, the held lock is released and replaced with a new HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock that represents the lock on the parent. This method will block until the parent lock becomes available, if necessary.
        Returns:
        the newly acquired lock on the parent
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this thread does not hold this lock or has already released it; if the lock that produced this HierarchicalLock.AcquiredLock is a root lock and does not have a parent; or if this operation involved promoting the implicit parent lock, and that could not be done because this thread already holds the parent lock more than once (from re-entrance)
        DeadlockException - if waiting for the parent lock would result in a deadlock (e.g. this thread holds a lock for which another thread is waiting, and that thread, or some other thread that directly or indirectly is waiting on it, is holding the parent lock)
